Typedef Documentation

typedef std::bitset<NUMBER_OF_PL_COMPUTABLE_OBJECTS> plSignature

Defines the set of derived Computable Objects of a particular Computable Object (e.g.

a plUniform is a plDistribution and a plComputableObject)
